import { SupersetClient } from '../../../connection';
export default function getDatasourceMetadata(_ref) {let { client = SupersetClient, datasourceKey, requestConfig } = _ref;
  return client.
  get({
    endpoint: `/superset/fetch_datasource_metadata?datasourceKey=${datasourceKey}`,
    ...requestConfig }).

  then((response) => response.json);
}
